proposal1.heroHeadline: ThriveLine is losing over 100 hours a year on proposals. Discover where it all vanishes.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, crafting client-ready proposals is a manual slog. With our system, get them in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Each of these issues is bleeding resources from ThriveLine.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Every hour spent on proposals is an hour missed on client work. For a team of two, this is unsustainable.

problems.title: Lost Deals
problems.description: Delayed proposals mean missed opportunities. Every day a proposal is late, potential clients look elsewhere.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Inconsistent branding confuses prospects. Lack of coherence costs potential trust and, ultimately, clients.

problems.title: Manual Errors
problems.description: Mistakes in proposals can cost deals. Each error chips away at ThriveLine's credibility.

problems.title: High Stress
problems.description: Proposals are a major stress point. Constant pressure impacts the quality of ThriveLine's creative output.

problems.title: Resource Misallocation
problems.description: Valuable design and SEO resources are wasted on proposal writing. This misallocation costs potential growth.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces all the inefficiencies listed above.

solutions.title: Instant Proposals
solutions.description: Currently, proposals drag on for hours. Our system delivers them in under a minute.

solutions.title: Brand Consistency
solutions.description: Inconsistent branding confuses clients. Our system ensures every proposal is on-brand, every time.

solutions.title: Error-Free Output
solutions.description: Manual proposals are prone to mistakes. Our AI eliminates errors and enhances professionalism.

solutions.title: Stress Reduction
solutions.description: Proposal creation is stressful and time-consuming. Our system alleviates stress by automating the process.

solutions.title: Optimized Resources
solutions.description: Time spent on proposals detracts from core services. Our system frees up resources for design and SEO work.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for ThriveLine's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for ThriveLine around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for ThriveLine.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Online Presence with ThriveLine's Expertise
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Our team will craft a tailored strategy to enhance your digital footprint, ensuring more conversions and lasting customer relationships.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently facing significant revenue losses due to missed online opportunities.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves without purchasing is a missed revenue opportunity. This results in an estimated loss of $5,000 monthly.

problems.title: Poor Mobile Experience
problems.description: With 60% of users visiting via mobile, a clunky interface can turn them away, costing you 20% in potential sales.

problems.title: Outdated Branding
problems.description: A tired brand image can lead to a loss of customer trust, affecting up to 15% of your repeat business.

problems.title: Unoptimized Content
problems.description: Content that doesn't engage can decrease search visibility by 30%, reducing inbound traffic.

problems.title: Lack of Social Media Engagement
problems.description: With minimal interaction on social platforms, you're missing out on engaging 40% of your target audience.

problems.title: Ineffective Email Campaigns
problems.description: Emails that don't convert lead to a potential loss of up to $3,000 in monthly revenue.

proposal2.solutionIntro: ThriveLine offers tailored solutions to mitigate these losses and drive growth.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: Revamp your site for better user experience and higher conversion rates.

solutions.title: Mobile Optimization
solutions.description: Ensure a seamless mobile experience to capture and retain mobile traffic.

solutions.title: Brand Refresh
solutions.description: Update your brand image to resonate with modern consumers and build trust.

solutions.title: Email Marketing
solutions.description: Craft compelling campaigns that convert, maximizing email ROI.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: ThriveLine is your go-to partner for digital transformation.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: With years of experience, we know what works and what doesn't.

whyUsCards.title: Creative Solutions
whyUsCards.description: We bring fresh ideas that stand out in the digital landscape.

whyUsCards.title: Results Driven
whyUsCards.description: Our focus is on delivering measurable outcomes for your business.

whyUsCards.title: Collaborative Approach
whyUsCards.description: We work closely with you to ensure our strategies align with your goals.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the dedicated team that will bring your project to life.

team.name: Marie-line Villers
team.bio: Marie-line leads strategy with a keen eye for detail and a passion for client relationships. She ensures every project aligns perfectly with client goals.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Strategy
process.description: Understanding your needs and crafting a tailored strategy.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: Creating designs and building the necessary tools to bring them to life.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Rolling out the strategies and designs effectively.

process.title: Review & Optimize
process.description: Monitoring performance and making necessary adjustments.

pricing.description: Ideal for businesses starting their digital journey.

pricing.description: Recommended for businesses looking to significantly boost their online presence.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's have a chat about how we can help you achieve your goals. No strings attached.

lead.company_description:
Transforming Kelowna Businesses Through Web Design & SEO Excellence.
From tailored websites to strategic local SEO, we empower Kelowna businesses to reach new heights online. Discover the difference a custom digital approach can make for your brand.
lead.headline: Seo Specialist | Hand Coding Expert
lead.company_technologies: ai, android, flutter, gmail, google apps, google tag manager, iot, laravel, magento, mailchimp mandrill, mobile friendly, python, remote, sharepoint, sparkpost, wordpress.org, xamarin
lead.keywords: web hosting, search engine optimization, web design, web maintenance, local seo, web repairs, design services, information technology & services, seo, search marketing, marketing, marketing & advertising
lead.personalization: ThriveLine is a woman-owned agency, which is rare in a field full of larger, male-led firms.
